If you're like most women, you'll start to experience menopause symptoms sometime between 40 and 55. Every woman's body is different, and you could be affected by one or many of over 30 identified symptoms, most commonly hot flashes, mood swings, night sweats, irritability, weight gain, insomnia, and even a loss of desire. These often crippling changes are all caused by your body's natural shift in hormone levels with the onset of menopause. Now you can face those changes head-on, with Avlimil.
